00030 #import "SBJSON.h"
00031 
00032 @implementation SBJSON
00033 
00034 - (id)init {
00035     self = [super init];
00036     if (self) {
00037         jsonWriter = [SBJsonWriter new];
00038         jsonParser = [SBJsonParser new];
00039         [self setMaxDepth:512];
00040 
00041     }
00042     return self;
00043 }
00044 
00045 - (void)dealloc {
00046     [jsonWriter release];
00047     [jsonParser release];
00048     [super dealloc];
00049 }
00050 
00051 #pragma mark Writer 
00052 
00053 
00054 - (NSString *)stringWithObject:(id)obj {
00055     NSString *repr = [jsonWriter stringWithObject:obj];
00056     if (repr)
00057         return repr;
00058     
00059     [errorTrace release];
00060     errorTrace = [[jsonWriter errorTrace] mutableCopy];
00061     return nil;
00062 }
00063 
00074 - (NSString*)stringWithObject:(id)value allowScalar:(BOOL)allowScalar error:(NSError**)error {
00075     
00076     NSString *json = allowScalar ? [jsonWriter stringWithFragment:value] : [jsonWriter stringWithObject:value];
00077     if (json)
00078         return json;
00079 
00080     [errorTrace release];
00081     errorTrace = [[jsonWriter errorTrace] mutableCopy];
00082     
00083     if (error)
00084         *error = [errorTrace lastObject];
00085     return nil;
00086 }
00087 
00097 - (NSString*)stringWithFragment:(id)value error:(NSError**)error {
00098     return [self stringWithObject:value
00099                       allowScalar:YES
00100                             error:error];
00101 }
00102 
00110 - (NSString*)stringWithObject:(id)value error:(NSError**)error {
00111     return [self stringWithObject:value
00112                       allowScalar:NO
00113                             error:error];
00114 }
00115 
00116 #pragma mark Parsing
00117 
00118 - (id)objectWithString:(NSString *)repr {
00119     id obj = [jsonParser objectWithString:repr];
00120     if (obj)
00121         return obj;
00122 
00123     [errorTrace release];
00124     errorTrace = [[jsonParser errorTrace] mutableCopy];
00125     
00126     return nil;
00127 }
00128 
00139 - (id)objectWithString:(id)value allowScalar:(BOOL)allowScalar error:(NSError**)error {
00140 
00141     id obj = allowScalar ? [jsonParser fragmentWithString:value] : [jsonParser objectWithString:value];
00142     if (obj)
00143         return obj;
00144     
00145     [errorTrace release];
00146     errorTrace = [[jsonParser errorTrace] mutableCopy];
00147 
00148     if (error)
00149         *error = [errorTrace lastObject];
00150     return nil;
00151 }
00152 
00162 - (id)fragmentWithString:(NSString*)repr error:(NSError**)error {
00163     return [self objectWithString:repr
00164                       allowScalar:YES
00165                             error:error];
00166 }
00167 
00175 - (id)objectWithString:(NSString*)repr error:(NSError**)error {
00176     return [self objectWithString:repr
00177                       allowScalar:NO
00178                             error:error];
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 
00183 #pragma mark Properties - parsing
00184 
00185 - (NSUInteger)maxDepth {
00186     return jsonParser.maxDepth;
00187 }
00188 
00189 - (void)setMaxDepth:(NSUInteger)d {
00190      jsonWriter.maxDepth = jsonParser.maxDepth = d;
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 #pragma mark Properties - writing
00195 
00196 - (BOOL)humanReadable {
00197     return jsonWriter.humanReadable;
00198 }
00199 
00200 - (void)setHumanReadable:(BOOL)x {
00201     jsonWriter.humanReadable = x;
00202 }
00203 
00204 - (BOOL)sortKeys {
00205     return jsonWriter.sortKeys;
00206 }
00207 
00208 - (void)setSortKeys:(BOOL)x {
00209     jsonWriter.sortKeys = x;
00210 }
